pagecontent.p: This page contains a list of common situation where musicGuru can help you. Just click on a situation similar to yours and you will be taken to a page detailing every task you need to perform.

li.a: How do I build a musicGuru collection?

ul.li: My whole music collection is in a single folder, but is quite messy. I'd like to sort it out.
My friend brought his hard disk full of music at home, and I'd like to merge his collection with mine.
I have old, unsorted mp3 CDs, as well as music on my hard drive. I want to make an organized CD backup of all my music.
I would like to record to CD songs that I haven't recorded yet.
I have conflicts in my design board.
